Task:
1. Create a new generative art piece using HTML5 Canvas or Python/PIL
2. Save the image to /data/workspace/art/daily_YYYY-MM-DD.png
3. Post the image to Discord channel 1470785472325222514 (#art) with a creative title and description
4. Include voting emoji in the post

Art style ideas (rotate daily):
- Constellation/node-based abstract portraits
- Particle systems with flowing motion
- Geometric patterns
- Nature-inspired generative art
- Abstract landscapes

Use the browser tool for Canvas screenshots, message tool for Discord posting.

After posting, announce in the message: "Daily Art Battle submission — vote with reactions!"
Current time: Thursday, February 19th, 2026 — 5:00 PM (UTC)

Return your summary as plain text; it will be delivered automatically. If the task explicitly calls for messaging a specific external recipient, note who/where it should go instead of sending it yourself.

3. Post to Discord channel 1470785472325222514 (#art) with title, description, and voting emoji
4. Include "Daily Art Battle submission — vote with reactions!" in the message

The date is February 19th, 2026, so the filename should be daily_2026-02-19.png.

For today's art style, I'll go with "Constellation/node-based abstract portraits" since it's the first one in the list.

Let me create the art piece first.

args.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <style>
        body { margin: 0; background: #0a0a1a; }
        canvas { display: block; }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
<canvas id="canvas" width="1200" height="800"></canvas>
<script>
const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

// Deep space gradient background
const gradient = ctx.createRadialGradient(600, 400, 0, 600, 400, 700);
gradient.addColorStop(0, '#1a1a3e');
gradient.addColorStop(0.5, '#0f0f2e');
gradient.addColorStop(1, '#050510');
ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
ctx.fillRect(0, 0, 1200, 800);

// Star field
for (let i = 0; i < 200; i++) {
    const x = Math.random() * 1200;
    const y = Math.random() * 800;
    const size = Math.random() * 2;
    const opacity = Math.random() * 0.8;
    ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(255, 255, 255, ${opacity})`;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
}

// Constellation nodes forming an abstract face profile
const nodes = [
    // Forehead
    {x: 400, y: 200, size: 8, color: '#64d8ff'},
    {x: 450, y: 180, size: 6, color: '#64d8ff'},
    {x: 500, y: 170, size: 7, color: '#8de0ff'},
    // Eye region
    {x: 380, y: 280, size: 10, color: '#ff6b9d'},
    {x: 420, y: 290, size: 5, color: '#ff8fab'},
    {x: 350, y: 270, size: 6, color: '#ffc2d1'},
    // Nose bridge
    {x: 460, y: 320, size: 7, color: '#ffd166'},
    {x: 480, y: 360, size: 5, color: '#ffe8ad'},
    // Cheek/Mouth area
    {x: 420, y: 400, size: 8, color: '#06d6a0'},
    {x: 380, y: 420, size: 6, color: '#0adab5'},
    {x: 340, y: 410, size: 5, color: '#8efce6'},
    // Chin/Jaw
    {x: 300, y: 480, size: 7, color: '#a78bfa'},
    {x: 350, y: 500, size: 6, color: '#c4b5fd'},
    {x: 400, y: 520, size: 8, color: '#ddd6fe'},
    // Ear
    {x: 280, y: 350, size: 5, color: '#f472b6'},
    {x: 260, y: 380, size: 4, color: '#f9a8d4'},
    // Hair/Top flowing nodes
    {x: 550, y: 220, size: 6, color: '#38bdf8'},
    {x: 600, y: 250, size: 5, color: '#7dd3fc'},
    {x: 580, y: 300, size: 7, color: '#bae6fd'},
    {x: 520, y: 350, size: 6, color: '#e0f2fe'},
    // Neck/Shoulder area
    {x: 320, y: 550, size: 6, color: '#fb923c'},
    {x: 280, y: 580, size: 5, color: '#fdba74'},
    // Background accent nodes
    {x: 700, y: 400, size: 4, color: '#a5f3fc'},
    {x: 750, y: 350, size: 3, color: '#cffafe'},
    {x: 800, y: 450, size: 5, color: '#67e8f9'},
    {x: 200, y: 600, size: 4, color: '#f0abfc'},
    {x: 900, y: 200, size: 3, color: '#c4b5fd'},
];

// Draw connections between nearby nodes
ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(100, 216, 255, 0.3)';
ctx.lineWidth = 1;
for (let i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++) {
    for (let j = i + 1; j < nodes.length; j++) {
        const dx = nodes[i].x - nodes[j].x;
        const dy = nodes[i].y - nodes[j].y;
        const dist = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
        if (dist < 180) {
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.moveTo(nodes[i].x, nodes[i].y);
            ctx.lineTo(nodes[j].x, nodes[j].y);
            ctx.stroke();
        }
    }
}

// Draw nodes with glow
nodes.forEach(node => {
    // Glow
    const glow = ctx.createRadialGradient(node.x, node.y, 0, node.x, node.y, node.size * 4);
    glow.addColorStop(0, node.color + '80');
    glow.addColorStop(0.5, node.color + '30');
    glow.addColorStop(1, 'transparent');
    ctx.fillStyle = glow;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(node.x, node.y, node.size * 4, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
    
    // Core
    ctx.fillStyle = node.color;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(node.x, node.y, node.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
});

// Add flowing particle trails
for (let i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
    const startX = 200 + Math.random() * 800;
    const startY = 100 + Math.random() * 600;
    ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(100, 216, 255, ${0.1 + Math.random() * 0.2})`;
    ctx.lineWidth = 0.5;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(startX, startY);
    for (let j = 0; j < 5; j++) {
        ctx.lineTo(
            startX + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 100,
            startY + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 100
        );
    }
    ctx.stroke();
}
</script>
</body>
</html>

args.content:
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFilter
import random
import math
import os

# Create directory if needed
os.makedirs('/data/workspace/art', exist_ok=True)

# Canvas size
width, height = 1200, 800

# Create base image with dark background
img = Image.new('RGB', (width, height), '#050510')
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)

# Create radial gradient background
for y in range(height):
    for x in range(0, width, 4):  # Sample every 4 pixels for speed
        dx = x - 600
        dy = y - 400
        dist = math.sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy) / 700
        dist = min(1.0, dist)
        r = int(26 - 21 * dist)
        g = int(26 - 21 * dist)
        b = int(62 - 52 * dist)
        draw.rectangle([x, y, x+3, y], fill=(r, g, b))

# Star field
for _ in range(200):
    x = random.randint(0, width)
    y = random.randint(0, height)
    size = random.uniform(0.5, 2)
    opacity = random.uniform(100, 255)
    draw.ellipse([x-size, y-size, x+size, y+size], fill=(255, 255, 255, int(opacity)))

# Constellation nodes forming abstract face profile
nodes = [
    # Forehead
    (400, 200, 8, (100, 216, 255)),
    (450, 180, 6, (100, 216, 255)),
    (500, 170, 7, (141, 224, 255)),
    # Eye region
    (380, 280, 10, (255, 107, 157)),
    (420, 290, 5, (255, 143, 171)),
    (350, 270, 6, (255, 194, 209)),
    # Nose bridge
    (460, 320, 7, (255, 209, 102)),
    (480, 360, 5, (255, 232, 173)),
    # Cheek/Mouth area
    (420, 400, 8, (6, 214, 160)),
    (380, 420, 6, (10, 218, 181)),
    (340, 410, 5, (142, 252, 230)),
    # Chin/Jaw
    (300, 480, 7, (167, 139, 250)),
    (350, 500, 6, (196, 181, 253)),
    (400, 520, 8, (221, 214, 254)),
    # Ear
    (280, 350, 5, (244, 114, 182)),
    (260, 380, 4, (249, 168, 212)),
    # Hair/Top flowing nodes
    (550, 220, 6, (56, 189, 248)),
    (600, 250, 5, (125, 211, 252)),
    (580, 300, 7, (186, 230, 253)),
    (520, 350, 6, (224, 242, 254)),
    # Neck/Shoulder area
    (320, 550, 6, (251, 146, 60)),
    (280, 580, 5, (253, 186, 116)),
    # Background accent nodes
    (700, 400, 4, (165, 243, 252)),
    (750, 350, 3, (207, 250, 254)),
    (800, 450, 5, (103, 232, 249)),
    (200, 600, 4, (240, 171, 252)),
    (900, 200, 3, (196, 181, 253)),
]

# Draw connections between nearby nodes
for i in range(len(nodes)):
    for j in range(i + 1, len(nodes)):
        x1, y1, _, c1 = nodes[i]
        x2, y2, _, c2 = nodes[j]
        dist = math.sqrt((x1-x2)**2 + (y1-y2)**2)
        if dist < 180:
            alpha = int(255 * (1 - dist/180) * 0.3)
            draw.line([(x1, y1), (x2, y2)], fill=(100, 216, 255, alpha), width=1)

# Draw nodes with glow effect
def draw_glow(draw, x, y, size, color):
    # Outer glow
    for r in range(size*4, size, -2):
        alpha = int(128 * (1 - (r-size)/(size*3)) * 0.3)
        glow_color = (color[0], color[1], color[2])
        draw.ellipse([x-r, y-r, x+r, y+r], outline=glow_color)
    # Core
    draw.ellipse([x-size, y-size, x+size, y+size], fill=color)

for x, y, size, color in nodes:
    draw_glow(draw, x, y, size, color)

# Add flowing particle trails
for _ in range(30):
    start_x = 200 + random.randint(0, 800)
    start_y = 100 + random.randint(0, 600)
    alpha = int((0.1 + random.random() * 0.2) * 255)
    points = [(start_x, start_y)]
    cx, cy = start_x, start_y
    for _ in range(5):
        cx += (random.random() - 0.5) * 100
        cy += (random.random() - 0.5) * 100
        points.append((cx, cy))
    if len(points) > 1:
        draw.line(points, fill=(100, 216, 255, alpha), width=1)

# Save the image
output_path = '/data/workspace/art/daily_2026-02-19.png'
img.save(output_path, 'PNG')
print(f"Art saved to: {output_path}")
